html:
1.2.20  7:54 am   You I got projects on a holiday break what do I do

     have you considered doing them

1.2.20  7:42 am   hello Bill. building your new keyboard (and whole hardware transformation actually) must have been interesting journey for you. for us, it was definitely interesting to follow from your answers here. would you consider releasing a reality video about this journey soon? even a short one would be interesting to watch.

     it will be heavily featured, all the way from may2019 to the present, on the reality page

1.2.20  7:14 am   What instruments do you use for songs? I think I'm going to use mostly an electronic keyboard. Is that a good choice?

     sure

1.2.20  6:41 am   where are the unicorns??

     look around you

1.2.20  6:21 am   If there was only one type of cheese, what should it be

     polish

1.2.20  5:58 am   what to do when you find it impossible to stay focused on any particular mindset for more than a day

     sounds like you need to make a catalog, of mindsets. after curating this catalog for a bit, you may win some key understanding. be careful not to make a catalog of catalogs, but that may be inevitable also. you can release that in the next catalog

1.2.20  5:57 am   i'm losing it, any advice

     book tour!

1.2.20  5:55 am   how to start when anywhere would work

     if anywhere is equally is good, then you must devise a fair random selection process, hopefully computer assisted

1.2.20  5:29 am   i'm going to the shops, you want anything?

     just a couple of shops

1.2.20  4:00 am   Is this content, can I consume it?

     lick it first

1.2.20  3:43 am   Should I go to bed?

     you could try

1.2.20  3:15 am   Wow do you sleep or nope?

     yes, how about you. wow also

1.2.20  2:59 am   The countdown was set for today, IIRC.

     not true

      Have you started a new countdown/edited the countdown?

     i never set any countdown for today. there is one that has been running since this summer and it has been counting down at an undisclosed pace

      I ask this because in a question today you said you were glad that the countdown was there even tho you were slowplaying it. This infers that the countdown is still going. So, what is it at now, just out of curiosity, since it seems you edited/created a new countdown.

     i did not

1.2.20  2:47 am   1.1.20 3:07 am HOW?

     i am webmaster

1.2.20  2:39 am   i really like the musicians who can play the same thing over and over again and not get bored or mess up and just play a role in the song instead of being the star of the show all the time. how do i learn to do that?

     if you join a band that performs regularly, you will very quickly start to understand your role and impact in the responsibility of carrying this package that you all must carry together. also i just realized another thing that may help, is to arrange and sequence your own music, because that will require you to understand and play everyone's role, and you will understand them all better

1.2.20  2:31 am   Genuine question, albeit a bit random: Do you like french toast?

     that michelle camillo record is pretty tasty

1.2.20  2:10 am   Forks or Spoons?

     in earnest,

1.2.20  1:37 am   hi

i ran out of computer ram what do i do?

     [~~~how about this~~~]

      have a nice day.

1.2.20  12:58 am   are you going to stack every book in the world

     that would be good, but if i had the resources to do that i would probably try to do something else like cancel trash

1.2.20  12:50 am   best color?

     it's best when it changes

1.2.20  12:45 am   do u think life exists in another planet?

     yes, as many planets as you can imagine. also plenty without life, as i'm sure you've seen nearby

1.2.20  12:21 am   Can you answer this question with a cryptic code? 

     no

1.2.20  12:03 am   Is something the way you would do, if it was the way that it would be if you knew what it was?

     [calculating] yes, absolutely

1.2.20  12:00 am   what number is the countdown timer at now?

     34

1.1.20  11:48 pm   if you put a question mark at the end of a sentence that should be a statement, does the question mark automatically make the statement a question?

     sometimes but it might sound a little weird

1.1.20  11:16 pm   green beer or white orange juice?

     i thought you would have a broader selection

1.1.20  11:15 pm   What do you think of the new decade

     so far it's only been 2 days, so i'd say it would be extremely premature to judge 10 years from the first 2 days

      and what are your hopes for it?

     i don't like to place hopes specifically on 10 year increments. time seems to flow more organically than that, and i typically get better hope results when i play off of the more actual and natural rhythms of life and time

1.1.20  11:07 pm   why do you not want to release an album? i think that your songs would compliment each other very nicely in one

     i've never liked songs being packaged that way. at the very least i don't understand the experience and therefore would not be best suited for making that. i would however, like to go a few steps further and tell full audio visual stories, similar to what you might see in the cinema, or

1.1.20  11:05 pm   what makes a new year good for you?

     it's not really possible to judge a brand new year, when most of it has not happened yet. all i can judge are my own aspirations and inspirations for the future, which doesn't necessarily run in exact yearly increments from jan 1

1.1.20  10:49 pm   How does airplane food make you feel?

     it makes me feel like i can fly

1.1.20  10:45 pm   Do you have or are in a poadcast?

     i've only guested but i am beginning to think i should have my own

1.1.20  10:44 pm   how many sides does a torus have

     0

1.1.20  10:33 pm   Answer questions while eating is a good choice? 

     no, need 2 hands

1.1.20  10:32 pm   How would you explain what is a cow or a horse for someone that have never seen one? 

     huge

1.1.20  10:04 pm   Say yes to this question

     i will think about it

1.1.20  10:01 pm   do you think computing is fun for computers?

     booting up is fun

1.1.20  9:43 pm   How is life on Neptune?

     mysterious. neptune is very hard to find. even if you find it, it's very difficult to find out who is there

1.1.20  9:28 pm   have you ever recorded reality audio while you were in the shower

     no

1.1.20  9:03 pm   A 2 year old I know learned how to say god dammit. Whaat should I do? 

     learn some new phrases also

1.1.20  8:57 pm   Why did you make it "ueqstions" and why did you make the 'q' green?

     to follow the same general design theme as most of the other pages on this site

1.1.20  8:53 pm   Did you know that every 60 seconds, a minute passes in Africa? 

     that's fascinating

1.1.20  8:52 pm   What should my senior quote be?

     see if you can get the glitched out text that goes all over the screen

1.1.20  8:34 pm   Would you be more or less productive if you had a clone of yourself? 

     probably less, because i would have to spend time raising and taking care of the baby

1.1.20  8:19 pm   Should I play the violin?

     yes, that you for checking with me

1.1.20  8:18 pm   what's with the 240 in your wall?

     i doubled it

1.1.20  8:02 pm   I was wondering, when I click "I'm feeling Randy", who is Randy and why are we feeling him?

     it's you. it's not a him, it's a feeling, which you are feeling, or presumably would be feeling if you clicked that button

1.1.20  7:39 pm   you said in a previous answer that you think you have songs that no one else has; can you give an example?

     i have alicia keys band doing 'a woman's worth' on letterman, 2001

1.1.20  7:09 pm   What is the first thing that comes to your mind when reading this question

     the question itself

1.1.20  7:03 pm   what kind of machine would you want to have existent?

     something where i can very quickly save and recall pre-set objects, and textures, in blender

1.1.20  6:53 pm   what should i analyze for when learning songs by ear

     what the notes and chords are, but more specifically, how you would best portray the same effect using your instrument(s)
